text: Mark off the width and height of Hatsune Miku. Add her head and a line through it.
Add guidelines for Miku’s arms, legs and head.
Outline the shapes of Miku’s legs, arms and mouth.
Add Hatsune’s fingers and pupils. Sketch her hair and clothes.
Draw the shapes of the hair and clothes. Add some details to the eyes.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Hatsune Miku, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the floor. Erase all guidelines.
